scripts.napi: cd ../.. && napi build --platform --cargo-name binding_core_node -p binding_core_node --release --pipe 'deno run -A scripts/generate-ts-type.ts' bindings
scripts.napi:dev: cd ../.. && napi build --platform --cargo-name binding_core_node -p binding_core_node --pipe 'deno run -A scripts/generate-ts-type.ts' bindings
